name: Jungle Run (Blue Yeti Studios)
description:
STORY

You are an explorer. You have just discovered an ancient temple where you have found an artifact of great value. Taking the artifact, you trigger the temple, and it begins to collapse along with the ground behind you. You run for your life and try to keep the artifact safe - how far will you get before you come to your inevitable death?

FEATURES

Jungle Run is an endless, procedurally-generated, platform runner where you play as an explorer who is running away with an artifact that he has found. The explorer must run as far as he can without being eaten by snakes, getting impaled by spikes, or being taken by the edge of the screen! You can create an account in-game so that each time you die, your score is saved to the online scoreboard, so you can see your high score and other players highscore! - only your highest score will be saved to the scoreboard. So, get playing and you can beat your high score, and get to the top of the scoreboard! How far will you get in the Jungle?

CONTROLS

MOUSE/LMB - menu navigation/interaction
SPACE - start running/jump
DOWN ARROW - duck
R - restart

CREDITS

Art by Hule Studios
Music by Tozan
Sounds provided by www.freesound.org
